## Powerful Digit Sum
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


Brutalt:
```{r}
library(gmp)
x <- 42
digitsum <- function(x){
  t <- as.character(as.bigz(x))
  y <- unname(sapply(t, function(x) sum(as.numeric(strsplit(x, "")[[1]])) ))
  return(y)
}

answer <- as.bigz(0)
for(i in 1:99){
  for(j in 1:99){
    res <- digitsum(as.bigz(i)^(as.bigz(j)))
    if(res > answer){
      answer <- res
    }
  }
}

```

digit_sum <- function(x){
  require(stringr)
  t <- str_split(x, "", simplify=TRUE)
  sum(as.integer(t))

}


t <- 1:12
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
t %>% 
  enframe() %>% 
  mutate(power = 9^value) %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(digsum = digit_sum(power))
